h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location
content: The Gall Gem Soak in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Bamboo Grove \- Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain after talking to the Shen Monkey Vendor upon freeing him from the enemy attacking him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Gall Gem Soak in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Bamboo Grove \- Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain after talking to the Shen Monkey Vendor upon freeing him from the enemy attacking him.
